commit.message:
Bump javaparser-symbol-solver-core from 3.15.17 to 3.15.18

Bumps [javaparser-symbol-solver-core](https://github.com/javaparser/javaparser) from 3.15.17 to 3.15.18.
- [Release notes](https://github.com/javaparser/javaparser/releases)
- [Changelog](https://github.com/javaparser/javaparser/blob/master/changelog.md)
- [Commits](https://github.com/javaparser/javaparser/compare/javaparser-parent-3.15.17...javaparser-parent-3.15.18)

Signed-off-by: dependabot-preview[bot] <support@dependabot.com>
added post get, delete and patch(WIP) to FormConfig endpoint
cleans up patching of a form config
apply patch pattern to managed executions
Merge branch 'feature/form-config' of https://github.com/bakdata/conquery into feature/form-config
Merge branch 'feature/form-config' of https://github.com/bakdata/conquery into feature/form-config

Bump classgraph from 4.8.67 to 4.8.69

Bumps [classgraph](https://github.com/classgraph/classgraph) from 4.8.67 to 4.8.69.
- [Release notes](https://github.com/classgraph/classgraph/releases)
- [Commits](https://github.com/classgraph/classgraph/compare/classgraph-4.8.67...classgraph-4.8.69)

Signed-off-by: dependabot-preview[bot] <support@dependabot.com>

Bump groovy from 3.0.2 to 3.0.3

Bumps [groovy](https://github.com/apache/groovy) from 3.0.2 to 3.0.3.
- [Release notes](https://github.com/apache/groovy/releases)
- [Commits](https://github.com/apache/groovy/commits)

Signed-off-by: dependabot-preview[bot] <support@dependabot.com>

Bump junit-jupiter from 5.6.1 to 5.6.2

Bumps [junit-jupiter](https://github.com/junit-team/junit5) from 5.6.1 to 5.6.2.
- [Release notes](https://github.com/junit-team/junit5/releases)
- [Commits](https://github.com/junit-team/junit5/compare/r5.6.1...r5.6.2)

Signed-off-by: dependabot-preview[bot] <support@dependabot.com>

Bump maven-shade-plugin from 3.2.2 to 3.2.3

Bumps [maven-shade-plugin](https://github.com/apache/maven-shade-plugin) from 3.2.2 to 3.2.3.
- [Release notes](https://github.com/apache/maven-shade-plugin/releases)

Signed-off-by: dependabot-preview[bot] <support@dependabot.com>
also use form values in hash computation

nodes.bodyText: Bin kein Fan von Streams rausgeben, brauchst du das als Stream hier/weiter unten?
Kannst du die Klasse bitte etwas dokumentieren, mir ist nicht ganz klar was die ist oder macht
Eine Exception wäre da vermutlich angemessener unten zu werfen wenn du davon ausgehst, dass es nicht passieren kann
Sollte Labelable nicht auch ein getLabel haben, dann würden die Klassen nicht einen Consumer MetaDataPatch erwarten sondern sich selbst und MetaDataPatch wäre ein TypeUnion all dieser Klassen?
